channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nun's Seasonal Calendar
channel.desc: In this episode, we learn about rikka and shoman, two dates of early summer. The temple chefs teach us how to make kimpira stir fry with itadori and mehari-zushi (eye-popping sushi).

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japan Railway Journal
channel.desc: Go behind the scenes of Japan's amazing railways! Interesting facts, new technologies, expert tips plus where to go, how to get there and more.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from May 22th, Day 12 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Tokyo.

channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.title: Design ? Stories
channel.desc: Today's theme: Design Hunting in Osaka. A thriving trade and economic hub with a unique culture. Join us on a hunt for regional designs that prioritize human connection in the welcoming city of Osaka.

channel.title: Medical Frontiers
channel.desc: A Japanese research team, focusing on the fact that people briefly wake up multiple times during sleep, helped develop a device to prevent insomnia. This episode shares the latest insights into sleep.

channel.title: Chatroom Japan
channel.desc: A Ghanaian entrepreneur and resident of Japan launched an online radio station as a way of giving back to the community. The project is inspiring some young Africans to pursue their own dreams.
